00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements base class for data list in Context objects.
00004 #
00005 package Value::Context::Data;
00006 use strict;
00007 use Scalar::Util;
00008 
00009 sub new {
00010   my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
00011   my $parent = shift;
00012   my $data = bless {
00013     context => $parent,     # parent context
00014     dataName => {},         # name of data storage in context hash
00015     tokens => {},           # hash of id => type specifications that will be made into a pattern
00016     patterns => {},         # hash of pattern => [type,precedence] specification for extra patterns
00017     tokenType => {},        # type of Parser token for these pattern
00018     namePattern => '',      # pattern for allowed names for new items
00019     name => '', Name => '', # lower- and upper-case names for the class of items
00020   }, $class;
00021   $data->weaken;
00022   $data->init();
00023   $parent->{$data->{dataName}} = {};
00024   push @{$parent->{data}{objects}},"_$data->{dataName}";
00025   $data->add(@_);
00026   return $data;
00027 }
00028 
00029 #
00030 #  Implemented in sub-classes
00031 #
00032 sub init {}
00033 sub create {shift; shift}
00034 sub uncreate {shift; shift}
00035 
00036 #
00037 #  Copy the context data
00038 #
00039 sub copy {
00040   my $self = shift; my $orig = shift;
00041   my $data = $orig->{context}->{$orig->{dataName}};
00042   my $copy = $self->{context}->{$self->{dataName}};
00043   foreach my $name (keys %{$data}) {
00044     if (ref($data->{$name}) eq 'ARRAY') {
00045       $copy->{$name} = [@{$data->{$name}}];
00046     } elsif (ref($data->{$name}) eq 'HASH') {
00047       $copy->{$name} = {%{$data->{$name}}};
00048     } else {
00049       $copy->{$name} = $data->{$name};
00050     }
00051   }
00052   $self->{tokens} = {%{$orig->{tokens}}};
00053   foreach my $p (keys %{$orig->{patterns}}) {
00054     $self->{patterns}{$p} =
00055       (ref($orig->{patterns}{$p}) ? [@{$orig->{patterns}{$p}}] : $orig->{patterns}{$p});
00056   }
00057 }
00058 
00059 #
00060 #  Make context pointer a weak pointer (avoids reference loops)
00061 #
00062 sub weaken {Scalar::Util::weaken((shift)->{context})}
00063 
00064 #
00065 #  Update the context patterns
00066 #
00067 sub update {(shift)->{context}->update}
00068 
00069 sub addToken {
00070   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00071   $self->{tokens}{$token} = $self->{tokenType}
00072     unless $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token}{hidden};
00073 }
00074 
00075 sub removeToken {
00076   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00077   delete $self->{tokens}{$token};
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 #
00082 #  Add one or more new items to the list
00083 #
00084 sub add {
00085   my $self = shift; my %D = (@_); return if scalar(@_) == 0;
00086   my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}};
00087   foreach my $x (keys %D) {
00088     Value::Error("Illegal %s name '%s'",$self->{name},$x) unless $x =~ m/^$self->{namePattern}$/;
00089     warn "$self->{Name} '$x' already exists" if defined($data->{$x});
00090     $data->{$x} = $self->create($D{$x});
00091     $self->addToken($x);
00092   }
00093   $self->update;
00094 }
00095 
00096 #
00097 #  Remove one or more items
00098 #
00099 sub remove {
00100   my $self = shift;
00101   my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}};
00102   foreach my $x (@_) {
00103     warn "$self->{Name} '$x' doesn't exist" unless defined($data->{$x});
00104     $self->removeToken($x);
00105     delete $data->{$x};
00106   }
00107   $self->update;
00108 }
00109 
00110 #
00111 #  Replace an item with a new definition
00112 #
00113 sub replace {
00114   my $self = shift; my %list = (@_);
00115   $self->remove(keys %list);
00116   $self->add(@_);
00117 }
00118 
00119 #
00120 #  Clear all items
00121 #
00122 sub clear {
00123   my $self = shift;
00124   $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}} = {};
00125   $self->{tokens} = {};
00126   $self->update;
00127 }
00128 
00129 #
00130 #  Make the data be only these items
00131 #
00132 sub are {
00133   my $self = shift;
00134   $self->clear;
00135   $self->add(@_);
00136 }
00137 
00138 #
00139 #  Make one or more items become undefined, but still recognized.
00140 #  (Implemented in the sub-classes.)
00141 #
00142 sub undefine {my $self = shift; $self->remove(@_)}
00143 
00144 #
00145 #  Redefine items from the default context, or a given one
00146 #
00147 sub redefine {
00148   my $self = shift; my $X = shift;
00149   my %options = (using => undef, from => "Full", @_);
00150   my $Y = $options{using}; my $from = $options{from};
00151   $from = $Parser::Context::Default::context{$from} unless ref($from);
00152   $Y = $X if !defined($Y) && !ref($X);
00153   $X = [$X] unless ref($X) eq 'ARRAY';
00154   my @data = (); my @remove = ();
00155   foreach my $x (@{$X}) {
00156     my $y = defined($Y)? $Y: $x;
00157     Value::Error("No definition for %s '%s' in the given context",$self->{name},$y)
00158       unless $from->{$self->{dataName}}{$y};
00159     push(@remove,$x) if $self->get($x);
00160     push(@data,$x => $self->uncreate($from->{$self->{dataName}}{$y}));
00161   }
00162   $self->remove(@remove);
00163   $self->add(@data);
00164 }
00165 
00166 
00167 #
00168 #  Get hash for an item
00169 #
00170 sub get {
00171   my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
00172   return $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$x};
00173 }
00174 
00175 #
00176 #  Set flags for one or more items
00177 #
00178 sub set {
00179   my $self = shift; my %D = (@_);
00180   my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}};
00181   foreach my $x (keys(%D)) {
00182     my $xref = $data->{$x};
00183     if (defined($xref) && ref($xref) eq 'HASH') {
00184       foreach my $id (keys %{$D{$x}}) {$xref->{$id} = $D{$x}{$id}}
00185     } else {
00186       $data->{$x} = $self->create($D{$x});
00187       $self->addToken($x);
00188     }
00189   };
00190 }
00191 
00192 #
00193 #  Get the names of all items
00194 #
00195 sub names {
00196   my $self = shift;
00197   return sort(keys %{$self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}});
00198 }
00199 
00200 #
00201 #  Get the complete data hash
00202 #
00203 sub all {
00204   my $self = shift;
00205   $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}};
00206 }

00212 
00213 END {
00214   use Value::Context::Flags;
00215   use Value::Context::Lists;
00216   use Value::Context::Diagnostics;
00217 }
